column1: Mass of Christian Burial will be at 11 AM Friday at Prince of Peace Catholic Church. Fr. Art Faesser will celebrate. Burial will be Kearney City Cemetery. The family will receive friends from 5-7 pm Thursday at Prince of Peace
column2: with a 7 pm vigil service. According to her wishes Agnes was cremated. Oï¿½Brien Straatmann Redinger Funeral Home is serving the family.
